title: WTB Blackstone , Greenvile T209 and/or T210

posts.post_title: WTB Blackstone , Greenvile T209 and/or T210
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy a T209 and/or T210 of Blackstone, Greenville. Pretty much any condition. 

I'm also interested in any Greenville stuff showing him. Team photos, postcards.....whatever. 

Steve B
